A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am not sure what to say\,  I will not go into major details in case you have not seen the movie and do not want to be spoil.  The Movie looks great and the Music is also very good overall.  The story for me is just very weak.  I do know this movie was being written during TFA and JJ just now pitch the story for Episode 9. So i have to think that with no overarching plan for these movies is one of the reasons for a weak story.
